As part of my second-year university Java course, I embarked on an engaging project involving a drone simulator. The primary aim was to design and develop a distinctive, interactive drone simulation utilizing Java. This project also incorporated user manual input for moving drones and offered a saving, loading and different levels of intensity for the drones. The complete source code for the project can be accessed through the GitHub link provided above.

Drone Simulation

Created in 2023, Social links: GitHub
